metadata.title: CVE-2023-40032 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libvips is a demand-driven, horizontally threaded image processing library.A specially crafted SVG input can cause libvips versions 8.14.3 or earlierto segfault when attempting to parse a malformed UTF-8 character. Usersshould upgrade to libvips version 8.14.4 (or later) when processinguntrusted input.

criterions.comment: vips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
